item.description:
The weather looks ok

http://www.weather.co...

Here's a list of all the courts in Boston in case all the courts get filled

http://www.tennisnort...

Updated location...please see below.

The weather looks nice for this weekend so I'm setting up a couple of Meetups for you all to get out and play. I am not available to host either Meetup this weekend so if someone could please volunteer to look after things, that would be great. Just send me a note if you're around to be an "interim-host" :)

Happy Hitting and I hope to be around next weekend.

Adam Kenger
Organizer
Somerville Tennis Meetup Group

4/23 Update:
Due to a request from the Assistant Athletic Director for Tufts University - we will no longer be holding Meetups at Tufts. This Meetup will be at Dugger Park on Mystic River Road in Medford (3 miles from Tufts).
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask, are you with meetup?
item.name: Sunday Afternoon Tennis at Dugger Park
